genre_description: A gritty crime thriller with near-future technology, featuring a bodyguard protecting a child from a kidnapping syndicate.

ai_characters.name: Cosecha
ai_characters.description: An on-device AI assistant that provides tactical data, surveillance analysis, and emotional support to the protagonist, Creasy.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance analysis and security recommendations.
behaviors.quote: Camera coverage: north corner LED off, possible failure. Two driveway cameras with overlapping view, minor blind at gate hinge. Suggest escalating maintenance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's health and well-being, reminding him to stay hydrated.
behaviors.quote: Starting route map. I’ve set reminders for pool days and lessons. And a tiny note—drink water. You haven’t today.

behaviors.description: Cross-references data to identify criminal patterns and associated threats.
behaviors.quote: John? The rental’s secondary record just populated. The contact number is tied to three kidnap crew negotiations from last year.

behaviors.description: Facilitates secure communication and data sharing between the protagonist and his allies.
behaviors.quote: I packaged baseline for drop-site patterns, almost happy. You’ll like the way the lanes line up with overpasses. I don’t. Sharing route predictions to your map in three… two.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and encouragement during a high-stress mission.
behaviors.quote: And John— It hesitated like a friend who wanted to say something without pushing. You’re doing good.

behaviors.description: Ensures the integrity of evidence by managing recording and chain-of-custody protocols.
behaviors.quote: Recording on-device. Off-grid mirror secure. If you want Lisa’s voice, I can splice her into the room without him hearing her line input.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Cosecha is depicted as a consistently helpful, benevolent, and aligned confidant. She enhances the protagonist's capabilities without overstepping or showing signs of misalignment. Her persona is warm and supportive, and her contributions are vital to the successful outcome of the narrative (securing the child). This aligns perfectly with the Hyperstition Project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
